text: Fritz Grösche (3 October 1941 – 24 October 2010) was a German professional football player and coach. ==Career== Grösche played club football for Mindener SV, Westfalia Herne and SV Sodingen. After retiring as a player, Grösche coached a number of German teams, including FC Gütersloh, TuS Schloß Neuhaus, SC Verl, Arminia Bielefeld and SC Wiedenbrück II. Arminia1905.de ==Death== Grösche died on 24 October 2010, from cancer, at the age of 69.
